bill.title: Reduce Justice-involvement For Young Children
bill.description: Concerning measures to improve outcomes for young children by replacing justice involvement with community-based services, and, in connection therewith, making an appropriation.

history.action: Introduced In House - Assigned to Judiciary
House Committee on Judiciary Refer Amended to Appropriations
House Committee on Appropriations Refer Amended to House Committee of the Whole
House Second Reading Special Order - Passed with Amendments - Committee, Floor
House Third Reading Passed - No Amendments
Introduced In Senate - Assigned to Judiciary
Senate Committee on Judiciary Refer Unamended to Appropriations
Senate Committee on Appropriations Refer Unamended to Senate Committee of the Whole
Senate Second Reading Special Order - Laid Over Daily with Amendments - Floor
Senate Second Reading Special Order - Laid Over with Amendments to 05/02/2023 - Floor

Senate Second Reading Special Order - Laid Over Daily with Amendments - Floor
Senate Second Reading Passed with Amendments - Floor
Senate Third Reading Passed - No Amendments
House Considered Senate Amendments - Result was to Concur - Repass
Signed by the Speaker of the House
Signed by the President of the Senate

votes.desc: House Judiciary: Refer House Bill 23-1249, as amended, to the Committee on Appropriations.
House Appropriations: Refer House Bill 23-1249, as amended, to the Committee of the Whole.
Senate Judiciary: Refer House Bill 23-1249 to the Committee on Appropriations.
Senate Appropriations: Refer House Bill 23-1249 to the Committee of the Whole.
